description: The final test of any Kokiri soldier was that of battle itself. By dumping a future warriors into a pit of Deku Babas, the victor would emerge with the skill they needed to fight in a war to defend the forest.
tooltip: The final test of any Kokiri soldier was that of battle itself. By dumping a future warriors into a pit of Deku Babas, the victor would emerge with the skill they needed to fight in a war to defend the forest. (+20% Attack Damage for all Melee Soldiers)
